verbs.description: roku plans to [V: shake] up [ARG1: how customers watch video] and it could help the company earn more ad dollars roku wants to get more media companies to put their content on its service in exchange for more advertising revenue share because of its dominant position in the streaming video space companies may be willing to broker those deals roku company
